targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "ping4" WHERE ("metric" = 'pl' AND "hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ping4" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "metric" = 'pl') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "snmp" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "metric" = 'CPU RE0' AND "service" = 'Juniper CPU ACX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "snmp" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "service" =~ /Juniper Memory~/ AND "metric" = 'MEM_RE0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "snmp" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "metric" = 'CPU RE0' AND "service" = 'Juniper CPU ACX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname"
SELECT last("value") FROM "snmp" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "metric" = 'MEM_FPC') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "service" fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "snmp" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "metric" = 'CPU RE0' AND "service" = 'Juniper CPU ACX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname"

SELECT SUM(mean) FROM (SELECT mean("value") FROM "Interface-check-command" WHERE ("hostname" = '$hostname' AND "service" !~ /.*ae.*/ AND "metric" = 'in_bits') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(2m), service) GROUP BY time(2m);

SELECT SUM(mean) FROM (SELECT mean("value") FROM "Interface-check-command" WHERE ("hostname" = '$hostname' AND "service" !~ /.*ae.*/ AND "metric" = 'out_bits') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(2m), service) GROUP BY time(2m);

list.definition: SELECT hosts.address FROM $datasource WHERE display_name = $hostname AND vars.device_type = $device_type;
list.label: IP address
list.name: address
list.query: SELECT hosts.address FROM $datasource WHERE display_name = $hostname AND vars.device_type = $device_type;

list.definition: SELECT services.display_name FROM $datasource WHERE display_name ~ IfCheck AND host_name ~ $hostname;
list.label: Interface-check
list.name: interface
list.query: SELECT services.display_name FROM $datasource WHERE display_name ~ IfCheck AND host_name ~ $hostname;

list.definition: SELECT services.display_name FROM $datasource WHERE host_name ~ $hostname AND display_name ~ FPC;
list.label: FPC
list.name: FPC
list.query: SELECT services.display_name FROM $datasource WHERE host_name ~ $hostname AND display_name ~ FPC;
